languages.text: "О да, и я очень надеюсь, что мы встретимся с ним снова! Эта змея должна ответить на пару вопросов — прежде чем отправится в очистительное пламя".

traits.locale_text: "О да, и я очень надеюсь что мы встретимся с ним снова! Эта змея должна ответить на пару вопросов — прежде чем отправится в очистительное пламя".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."
languages.original_text: "О да, и я очень надеюсь, что мы встретимся с ним снова! Эта змея должна ответить на пару вопросов — прежде чем отправится в очистительное пламя".

traits.locale_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he drowns in cleansing flame."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he drowns in cleansing flame."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."

traits.locale_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “噢，是啊，我真诚地希望能再次见到他！在我把那条毒蛇丢进净化的烈焰之前，他需要先回答我几个问题。”
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."

traits.locale_text: “噢，是啊，我真诚地希望能再次见到他！在我把那条毒蛇丢进净化的烈焰之前，他需要先回答我几个问题。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Así es. ¡Y espero que nos volvamos a cruzar con él! Esa víbora tiene muchas preguntas que responder antes de ser consignado al fuego purificador».
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. ¡Y espero que nos volvamos a cruzar con él! Esa víbora tiene muchas preguntas que responder antes de ser consignado al fuego purificador».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ええ、そうです、そして彼にまた会えることを心から願っています！あの大蛇には、浄化の炎に包まれる前に、いくつかの質問に答えてもらわねばならない」
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、そうです、そして彼にまた会えることを心から願っています！あの大蛇には、浄化の炎に包まれる前に、いくつかの質問に答えてもらわねばならない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, und ich hoffe inständig, dass wir ihn wiedertreffen! Die Schlange wird mir einige Fragen beantworten – und dann den reinigenden Flammen übergeben."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, und ich hoffe inständig, dass wir ihn wiedertreffen! Die Schlange wird mir einige Fragen beantworten – und dann den reinigenden Flammen übergeben."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, et j'espère sincèrement que nous le retrouverons ! Ce serpent doit répondre à quelques questions... avant d'être plongé dans la flamme purificatrice. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, et j'espère sincèrement que nous le retrouverons ! Ce serpent doit répondre à quelques questions... avant d'être plongé dans la flamme purificatrice. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Evet. Onunla tekrar karşılaşmayı iple çekiyorum! O yılanın ifadesini alacağım, sonra da arındırıcı ateşle kendisini yakacağım."
languages.original_text: "Oh yes, and I sincerely hope that we will meet him again! That serpent needs to answer a few questions — before he is plunged into cleansing flame."

traits.locale_text: "Aynen öyle. Onunla tekrar karşılaşmayı iple çekiyorum! O yılanın ifadesini alacağım, sonra da arındırıcı ateşin kalbinde kendisini yakacağım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
